title: トランプ一族関連のアメリカン・ビットコイン、売上高99億円に増加　決算発表
contentSnippet: トランプ一族の仮想通貨マイニング企業「アメリカン・ビットコイン」が2025年7～9月期決算を発表した。前年同期比で黒字転換し、ビットコイン保有量は4,090BTCに到達している。

title: ジャック・ドーシーのCash App、ステーブルコイン決済機能を導入
contentSnippet: 決済アプリのキャッシュアップがステーブルコインの送受信機能を含む11の新機能を発表した。ライトニングネットワークを使用したビットコイン決済機能も拡充している。

title: Crypto oversight by CFTC over SEC is ‘directionally correct’ — Jeff Park
contentSnippet: Jeff Park’s pro-CFTC comments come just days after US senators introduced a bill pushing to shift crypto oversight from the SEC to the CFTC.

title: ソニー銀行の米銀免許申請、通貨監督庁に全米独立コミュニティ銀行家協会が否認を要求
contentSnippet: ソニー銀行が米国で信託銀行の国家免許を申請したことについて、米組織ICBAが強く反対すると表明。通貨監督庁に書簡を送付して反対理由を説明し、ソニー銀行の申請を認可しないように要求した。

title: BItcoin hits 6-month low as AI fears add to risk-off mood: How are pro traders positioned?
contentSnippet: The weakness in the AI sector contributed to the crypto market downturn, as spot BTC ETF outflows and isolated selling sent Bitcoin price to a six-month low.

title: バイナンス、ブラックロックのトークン化ファンド「BUIDL」を取引担保として受け入れ
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨取引所バイナンスがブラックロックの「BUIDL」を取引所外担保として統合した。BUIDLはBNBチェーンで新シェアクラスも立ち上げる。

title: SOL drops to 5-month low despite Solana spot ETF success: Is $100 next?
contentSnippet: Solana ETFs recorded inflows for 13 consecutive days, but SOL price lost key technical support levels, sparking fears of a drop to $100.

title: Probability of December interest rate cut falls below 50%
contentSnippet: Nearly 67% of investors forecast an interest rate cut of 25 basis points in December when polled during the first week of November.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: ビットマイン、45億円相当のイーサリアムを追加購入　新CEOにHSBC元幹部を任命
contentSnippet: ビットマインが3000万ドル相当の仮想通貨イーサリアムを追加購入した。同社は新CEOにHSBCアジアTMT投資銀行部門の元責任者を任命した。

title: BitMine appoints new CEO amid Ether buying spree
contentSnippet: BitMine held about $11 billion worth of ETH as of this week, making it the largest Ether treasury in the cryptocurrency industry.

title: Bitcoin miners retreat sharply as BTC pulls back from recent highs
contentSnippet: Major mining stocks dropped 20%–50% this week, erasing billions in value as the sector continued to lag Bitcoin’s latest pullback.

title: Bitcoin's 2-year trend is about to collapse: Will bulls defend $90K?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin lost multiple critical support areas as data show short-term investors holding on to capitulation-level losses, raising fears of a deeper breakdown in BTC price.

title: ビットコイン長期保有者が1カ月で12兆円相当BTCを売却、初期投資家も2400BTCを取引所へ送金
contentSnippet: ビットコインの長期保有者が過去1カ月で約81万5,000BTCを売却し、2024年1月以来の高水準となった。初期保有者のオーウェン・ガンデン氏も2400BTC以上を売却している。

title: Binance adds BlackRock’s BUIDL as off-exchange collateral for institutional traders
contentSnippet: The integration marks another step in centralized exchanges adopting tokenized Treasurys, expanding RWA collateral across major trading platforms.

title: Latest BTC market dip is relatively small, but sentiment is in freefall
contentSnippet: Bitcoin has seen bigger crashes during the current cycle, but investor sentiment is hovering near lows not seen since March.

title: ストラテジーのセイラー会長、6900億円相当のビットコイン売却の噂を否定
contentSnippet: ストラテジーのマイケル・セイラー会長が47000BTCの売却憶測を否定した。オンチェーン上の動きは保管業者の入れ替えによるもので、実際に購入ペースを加速させていると説明。

title: Bitcoin Slides Below $95K in Worst Week Since March; Analyst Sets Downside Target at $84K
contentSnippet: BTC has tumbled nearly 9% this week, while ETH, SOL declined even further and XRP outperformed.

title: Bitcoin Is Falling, But Don't Call It a Bear Market Yet: Analyst
contentSnippet: Bitcoin dropped below $95K amid panic selling and shifting Fed rate expectations, though it may be too soon to call it a bear market.

title: Trump Bros' American Bitcoin Stock Rises After Q3 Revenue Spike
contentSnippet: The Trump family-backed American Bitcoin mining firm shared quarterly results on Friday, adding more volatility to its stock's performance.

title: 'Demonic': AI App That Lets Users 'Talk' to Dead Loved Ones Faces Backlash
contentSnippet: 2Wai’s new “HoloAvatar” tool turns minutes of footage into lifelike replicas of deceased loved ones, igniting ethical alarms over consent, privacy, and the commercialization of grief.

title: U.S. DOJ Pursues North Korea's Illicit Money Machine, Seizes More Crypto
contentSnippet: U.S. authorities secured several criminal convictions and gathered another $15 million in proceeds from North Korean crypto heists, the Justice Department said.

title: Michael Saylor Denies Bitcoin Sale Rumors, Says Strategy's BTC Buys Are 'Accelerating'
contentSnippet: Strategy's co-founder and executive chairman described the company's hunger for Bitcoin as insatiable, while denying rumors of a recent sale.

title: 'Some Bad Shit. Very Bad': Jeffrey Epstein Was Worried About Bitcoin and Crypto Taxes, Emails Reveal
contentSnippet: A year prior to his death, the sex offender attempted to influence the Trump administration's crypto policy through Steve Bannon.

title: Oklahoma Man Gets Five-Year Sentence for $9.4M Crypto Ponzi Scheme
contentSnippet: Travis Ford pleaded guilty to conspiracy to commit wire fraud in January, in a case involving millions in investor losses.

title: XRP Slides 7% but ETF Launch Sets Stage for Potential Reversal Above $2.36
contentSnippet: Analysts caution that the market remains vulnerable to further declines, with large token movements and macroeconomic factors contributing to uncertainty.

title: Bitcoin below $95k! Majors nosedive 8-12%! JPMorgan bullish on Circle!
contentSnippet: Crypto majors fell 7–12% in one of the year’s biggest selloffs, with Bitcoin down 8% to $95,200, Ethereum down 11% to $3,100, BNB down 7% to $895, and Solana down 12% to $137. A few assets bucked the

title: Tom Lee's $11 Billion Ethereum Treasury Firm BitMine Appoints New CEO
contentSnippet: BitMine Immersion Technologies stock price is sliding Friday alongside Ethereum, following the firm's appointment of a new CEO.

title: BlackRock’s $2.5B Tokenized Fund Gets Listed as Collateral on Binance, Expands to BNB Chain
contentSnippet: The $2.5 billion BUIDL fund, tokenized by Securitize, deepens its utility for institutional traders and expands to a new blockchain.

title: Canary Likely to Hit Pause on New ETF Filings After Launching XRP
contentSnippet: The firm’s CEO says it has ‘filed everything that falls under the generic listing standards’ as SEC approval barriers remain high.

title: CFO Convicted for Losing $35 Million of Company Money in Crypto Side Hustle
contentSnippet: Nevin Shetty invested the stolen funds in DeFi lending protocols in 2022, and was starting to turn a handsome profit—until Terra and the broader crypto market collapsed.

title: This $2.5 Billion BlackRock Fund Is Coming to Binance and BNB Chain
contentSnippet: BlackRock’s $2.5 billion USD Institutional Digital Liquidity Fund (BUIDL) is expanding to Binance and BNB Chain, Securitize said Friday.

title: Ether Tumbles 8% as ETFs Bleed Over $1.4B, Long-Term Holders Sell
contentSnippet: ETH plunged below $3,100 on Friday as the crypto selloff accelerated with bitcoin losing the $100,000 level.

title: 'No Truth to the Rumor': Michael Saylor Says Strategy Aggressively Accumulating Bitcoin
contentSnippet: Amid the continued panicky action in crypto, online chatter suggested Strategy was unloading some of its bitcoin stack, a rumor Executive Chairman Michael Saylor shot down Friday morning.

title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: AAVE Falls 7.8%, Leading Index Lower
contentSnippet: Uniswap (UNI) was also among the underperformers, declining 5.5% from Thursday.

title: Tom Lee's Ethereum Treasury Firm BitMine Immersion Appoints Chi Tsang as CEO
contentSnippet: Tsang has replaced Jonathan Bates, who led the former bitcoin mining firm from its early days through its pivot to an Ethereum treasury strategy.

title: Trump Family-Linked American Bitcoin Posts Q3 Profit, Doubles Revenue
contentSnippet: The shares slumped more than 13% in pre-market trading as the price of bitcoin tumbled.

title: CourtYard（コートヤード）でトレカをNFT化｜使い方を初心者向けに徹底解説
contentSnippet: トレーディングカードをNFT化して取引できるCourtYard（コートヤード）の使い方を解説。アカウント開設からPolygon上での取引方法、ガス代準備、リスクまで初心者向けに図解で詳しく紹介します。

title: ビットコインウォレットのおすすめは？種類・選び方・アドレス作成手順まで解説
contentSnippet: ビットコインウォレットの種類や違い、安全な選び方を徹底解説。ハードウェア・ソフトウェアの比較からアドレス作成、セキュリティ対策まで初心者にもわかりやすく紹介します。

title: 米ビットコイン現物ETF、過去2番目の規模の純流出　リスクオフが加速
contentSnippet: 11月13日、ビットコイン現物ETFは8.7億ドル（約1,340億円）の純流出を記録し、過去2番目の規模に。イーサリアムETFも3日連続で流出。FRB当局者の慎重発言を受け、仮想通貨と米国株が同時に下落。専門家は健全な調整との見方も。
